title: Effective Utilization Strategies for Science Online Teaching Materials for Educators: Experiment and Inquiry-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience, basic scientific experiment design, and data analysis capabilities
context.additional_context: For science field managers/leaders, strengthening competencies in utilizing science education materials according to teaching career stages. Particularly emphasizes virtual experiment design and scientific inquiry process evaluation.

learning_goals: Participants will select customized online science educational materials (virtual experiments, observational data analysis, etc.) by career stage and apply them to the scientific inquiry process.
Participants will develop a plan for science expertise enhancement utilizing the strengths of teacher-created materials (customized variable control, field-oriented experimental design).

Participants will implement three science education scenarios (lab safety training, precision equipment operation, scientific problem-solving) using smartphone-based VR/simulation tools (e.g., Google Cardboard, Unity-based apps) and demonstrate educational effectiveness by achieving at least 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in learner satisfaction surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
